item.description:
Hi Everybody! Join us for a holwing good time at our annual Howl-o-ween Party. The fur will be flying as we dance to the Monster Mash, take flying lessons, and check out our Pointy Fangs! Our Costume Contest will have prizes for Cutest, Scariest, and Most Original costumes so dress the kids up and get ready for the fun. Games include: Follow the Leader Haunted Maze, A Ghost Hunt, Trick or Treat, Bobbing for apples and of course Howling at the Moon. Enter our Raffle to win a Basket of Goodies from The Barkery! Yumm. We can't wait to see you all.


Remember to bring your updated vaccine records for Rabies, DHLLP, & Bordetella

Luv,
Auntie Becky
item.name: Happy Howl-o-ween
